tool.name: MS-GF+ (v2017.01.27) Proteome Indexer

regex.match: Could not create the Java virtual machine

tool.command: set -x && msgfjar=${__tool_directory__}/../lib/msgfplus/MSGFPlus-v20170127.jar && ( [ -f "\$msgfjar" ] || (echo MSGFPlus.jar not found && exit 1)) && DIR=`dirname "${all_proteome_source.fields.path}"` && BASE=`basename "${all_proteome_source.fields.path}"` && rm -rf "\$DIR/msgfplus_index" && mkdir -p "\$DIR/msgfplus_index" && ln -s "${all_proteome_source.fields.path}" "\$DIR/msgfplus_index/\$BASE" && memory="$advanced.memory" && java -Xms\$memory -Xmx\$memory -cp "\$msgfjar" edu.ucsd.msjava.msdbsearch.BuildSA -d "\$DIR/msgfplus_index/\$BASE" -tda 2 && python ${__tool_directory__}/generate_table_entries.py "${out_file}" "${all_proteome_source.fields.value}" "${all_proteome_source.fields.name}" "\$DIR/msgfplus_index/\$BASE"
